shortDescription.value: Be the ultimate crowd pleaser this Summer with this glorious fried gold feast. Mix up the sides and feed the house all their faves.

longDescription.value: 8 Pieces Original  Recipe Chicken, 6 Nuggets, 2 Large Chips, 2 Large Potato & Gravy and 1 Dipping Sauces.

shortDescription.value: Be the ultimate crowd pleaser with this glorious fried gold feast. Mix up the sides and feed the house all their faves. Not everywhere and not forever. Online only.

longDescription.value: Be the ultimate crowd pleaser with this glorious fried gold feast. Mix up the sides and feed the house all their faves. Not everywhere and not forever. Online only.
Feast your eyes (and taste buds) on this – 10 pieces of Original Recipe Chicken and scrumptious KFC sides (including Chippies of course).

content.longDescription: Feast your eyes (and taste buds) on this – 10 pieces of Original Recipe Chicken and scrumptious KFC sides (including Chippies of course).

shortDescription.value: The legendary KFC Freeze is the daddy of frozen drinks. Grab a refreshing Mountain Dew Freeze and you're set. This offer is not everywhere and not forever. Mountain Dew Freeze contains Caffeine and is not recommended for children, pregnant or lactating women or individuals sensitive to caffeine.
